name: simple-select
description: A simple to implement, lightweight select component for vanilla JS

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js:
esbuild src/simple-select.js --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/simple-select.min.js --banner:js="/*!
 * Simple Select v$npm_package_version
 * https://github.com/w-kuipers/simple-select
 * Copyright (c) 2024 Simple Select
 * Released under the MIT License
 * Date: $(date +%Y-%m-%d)
 */"
